Key Match Events: Nathan Lukes drove in the winning run with a double in the eighth inning
Davis Schneider added a two-run home run
Miscellaneous Highlights: Toronto Blue Jays pinch hitter George Springer singled off right-hander Andrew Kittredge (4-5) with one out in the eighth
Others: Toronto Blue Jays beat the St. Louis Cardinals 3-2 on Sunday to complete a three-game sweep
Right-hander Zach Pop (2-4) retired Nolan Arenado, the only batter he faced, for the final out of the eighth
Righty Chad Green stranded two runners in the ninth to earn his 17th save in 20 chances
